    2K24 Elevate Your Expertise

    Boost your skills with guidance in various tech domains. Gain expert knowledge, hands-on experience, personalized mentoring, and earn a certification. Transform your future, REGISTER NOW!!



    -by ZAIRZA  
    What is Skills++?


    Get registered and join your respective domain discord channel mentioned after registration
    Get one on one mentorship from your members along with assignments on start of each week

    Earn badges on successful submission of assignments of 4 weeks and a certificate at the end of 4th week

    Event Schedule

    TIMELINE

    Week 0:

    22nd July - 28th July

    Week 1:

    29nd July - 4th July

    Week 2:

    5th July - 11th July

    Week 3:

    12th July - 18th July

    Badges and Certificate

    PERKS

    Level up and earn a new badge each week, and collect all four to receive a certificate of completion after your fourth successful submission, marking your mastery of the program.
